name: 1.A machine-washable Sofa Shield slipcover to protect your favorite chair from pet hair and spills.
description: The slip cover is reversible. Promising review: This is the best product for dog protection. I bought two for my double recliner and then just folded the inner sides over each other. The brown is a dark brown and the doggie-print side is very cute! It is totally worth the purchase! It is packaged great and easy to open.” —Jennifer   Price: $19.99+ (available in six sizes and 14 colors)

name: 3.A nonstick Calphalon saucepan constructed with heavy-gauge aluminum to provide even heating and durability as you cook up tasty dishes.
description: The interior includes three layers of nonstick coating — two layers provide durability and the third layer helps with easy release. Plus, the brushed stainless steel handles are designed to stay cool on the stovetop, meaning less accidentally burned fingertips as you're whipping up something delicious. Promising review: “I purchased this pan for my husband for Christmas. It is a large pan which replaces the use of a deep pot for many dishes. We LOVE it! It has a heavy weight, nice handles, flat bottom and the coating is superb. This is important to me because he cooks and I clean! I’d highly recommend this pan to others.” —LuvsCheesse   Price: $66.99 (for a 2.5-quart pan)

name: 8.A metal rolling cart to add some extra storage space to any room or office.
description: Promising review: “This is a great little cart. It rolls well. My wife is using it as a tool cart along side her long-arm quilting machine and is pleased. It is easy to assemble and nice-looking.” —Terry W. Mosier   Price: $44.99+ (available in five styles)

name: 9.A pair of Skechers slippers so you can lounge around the house in comfort while keeping your toes oh-so warm.
description: Promising review: “I love these! They fit true to size. The gray faux fur is not only around the outside of the ankle but runs as a lining for the footbed, as well. This makes them more comfortable and warm, which is a nice bonus.” —A. Boyer   Price: $19.95+ (available in sizes 5-11 and in 10 colors)

name: 10.A stunning necklace with an angel-wings heart pendant that you’ll never want to take off.
description: Promising review: “I bought this for a friend. When it arrived, I loved it so much I wanted to keep it. She loved it. It very beautiful and the chain is thicker than expected!” —B. Levesque   Price: $25.99 (available in five styles)

name: 11.A copy of Venom to enjoy Eddie Brock’s thrilling evolution into the superhero Venom.
12.A fab pair of Adidas T10 pants perfect for workouts or to ace that sporty-chic look you're going for.
description: Promising review: “I am 5’9” and typically wear a medium in my clothes. I am a senior citizen. I got these in a large and they are perfect for me as I did not want anything too 'revealing.’ I LOVE the pockets and the length is great for long legs. They wash nicely and are great for the gym or wearing around town.” —M. Fischer  Price: $24.99+ (available in sizes XS-2XL and in two colors)

name: 13.A quilted diaper bag you'll be able to easily wipe clean, ensuring you and your baby are always looking fly.
description: The bag features stroller straps, two side pockets, one main compartment with a zip closure, and a changing pad.Promising review: "This is my daughter's first baby. I wanted her to have a diaper bag that she can carry all the things she needs and also to look fashionable. This diaper bag is all that and more. I love that is has so many pockets and the material is very sturdy. My daughter cried when she saw it. It's beautiful!" —GoocheefeePrice: $55 (available in six colors)

name: 14.A fierce pair of Columbia Women’s Ice Maiden II boots that'll keep your feet warm and cozy no matter what the elements decided to put you through.
description: Promising review: “These boots are comfortable on my wide feet and super affordable. I wear thick socks with these boots for the first week and break-in is minimal. They've kept my feet warm and — most importantly — DRY during the past two winter storms. You won’t regret this purchase.” —A. Jenkins   Price: $54.90+ (available in sizes 5-12 and in eight colors)

name: 16.An eye-catching set of agate coasters so you can keep surfaces safe while making a major home decor statement.
description: The set includes four coasters.  Promising review: “These coasters came out perfectly. Obviously ROCK is not absorbent. If you're looking for very functional coasters, this is not it. But glasses do not slide off, they are not awkwardly cut to where they seem unstable. Honestly they're simply gorgeous rock coasters. Take it for what it is. They did a great job of selecting pieces that are different and unique. I would 100% purchase from here again.” —Amazon Customer   Price: $22.99+ (available in two sizes and six colors)

name: 17.A bottle of Chosen Foods Avocado Oil, a cooking oil that you can use for high-heat cooking or to make dressings and sauces.
description: Promising review: “This is a great all-around oil, both for cooking, as it has a high flash point, but also for salad dressings, mayo, and baking. I first found it at Costco, but it comes and goes there. This is the best deal I've found, and I got it in two days. It's going on my reorder list!” —Lori S   Price: $19.99
